mapper.sql: pteam_id, team_code, team_name, start_time, end_time, contact, create_date, update_date,see_num,logistics_type,create_user
mapper.insert:
insert into plat_team
pteam_id,
team_code,
team_name,
start_time,
end_time,
team_type,
contact,
create_date,
update_date,
see_num,
region_type,
logistics_type,
create_user,
#{pteamId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{teamCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{teamType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{seeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{regionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{logisticsType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update plat_team
team_code = #{teamCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
team_name = #{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
team_type = #{teamType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
see_num = #{seeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
region_type = #{regionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
logistics_type = #{logisticsType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pteam_id = #{pteamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM plat_team p,(SELECT pteam_id,region_name FROM plat_team_region GROUP BY pteam_id) ptr WHERE p.pteam_id = ptr.pteam_id and
goods_name like CONCAT('%','${goods_name}','%' ) and
p.pteam_id=#{platTeamId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
p.team_code=#{team_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
p.team_name like CONCAT('%','${team_name}','%' ) and
#{start_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >= p.start_time and
p.end_time >= #{end_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
1=1 order by p.create_date desc

SELECT p.pteam_id, p.team_code, p.team_name, p.start_time, p.end_time, p.contact, p.logistics_type, p.team_type, GROUP_CONCAT(ptr.region_name SEPARATOR ',') AS region_name FROM plat_team p LEFT JOIN plat_team_region ptr ON p.pteam_id = ptr.pteam_id where
goods_name like CONCAT('%','${goods_name}','%' ) and
p.pteam_id=#{platTeamId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
p.team_code=#{team_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
p.team_name like CONCAT('%','${team_name}','%' ) and
#{start_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >= p.start_time and
p.end_time >= #{end_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
1=1 GROUP BY p.pteam_id order by p.create_date desc

select pt.team_name, ptr.region_id, ptr.region_name, ptr.goods_name, ptr.market_price, ptr.region_price, ptr.goods_id, ptr.stock, ptr.rebate_value from plat_team_region ptr,plat_team pt WHERE ptr.pteam_id=pt.pteam_id and pt.pteam_id=#{platTeamId}
mapper.insert: insert into plat_team (pteam_id, team_code, team_name, start_time, end_time, team_type, contact, create_date, update_date, see_num, region_type, logistics_type, create_user) values (#{pteamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{teamType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{seeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logisticsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

pteam_id,

start_time,
end_time,
team_type,
contact,

see_num,
